How HighEndFree Works

Earn full Amazon refunds in exchange for verified 5‑star reviews. Follow the simple steps below to get started.

1

Browse Available Products

Check your tier's product channel to see what items are currently available. Note the agent who posted the product — you'll need this for your ticket.

2

Open a Ticket

Go to the agent's ticket channel and click Create a Ticket. Wait for the agent to confirm your ticket before continuing.

3

Request the Product

Tell the agent which item you're interested in. They'll confirm availability and share any special instructions (like adding a photo or video).

4

Share Your Details

Provide your Amazon profile link and PayPal username in the ticket for refund processing.

5

Purchase the Product

Once approved, buy the item on Amazon at full price and wait for it to arrive before reviewing.

6

Leave a 5‑Star Review

After receiving your order, wait at least 3 days, post a 5‑star review, and include photos/videos if requested. Only submit after Amazon confirms your review is live.

7

Submit Review Link

Send your live review link in the ticket. The agent will verify it.

8

Get Your Refund

Once verified, your full refund will be sent to your PayPal account — and you keep the product!

Need help? Open a support ticket or message a staff member.

Frequently asked questions

Quick answers to common questions.

How does this work?

Create a ticket with an agent, purchase the product, leave a verified 5‑star review, then receive a full PayPal refund.

How long do refunds take?

Typically within 24–48 hours after your review is verified by the agent.

What do I need to provide?

Your Amazon profile link, PayPal username, and the live review link when it’s posted.

Is this safe?

We work with verified sellers and agents. Your data is kept private and used only for processing refunds.

Ready to start earning full refunds?

Join and follow the 8‑step process. It’s simple, transparent, and designed for a smooth reviewer experience.
